attributes.action: Hold a General Election now that Tony Blair's resignation as party leader and Prime Minister has been annouced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the Prime Minister has announced his resignation of office and therefore ending his term as Prime Minister on June 27th 2007. The undersigned are in favour of the Prime Minister announcing a general election to enable the eligible voting public to choose their Prime Minister as should be the case in a free democratic society. The current government were elected on the promise that the Prime Minister would serve a full term in office.  Now that this promise has been broken the government should give the public the chance to elect their Prime Minister as opposed to having one forced upon them.
